name: userADgents
description: UserADgents is one of the leading agencies in mobile marketing consultancy, helping companies develop tailor-made solutions for smartphones, tablets and connected TVs. UserADgents is the only French agency to cover all the problems around nomadic terminals. Established in 2008, the agency is made up of more than 20 experts who are involved in both consulting and design, design and ergonomics, development and maintenance, distribution and promotion of mobile services.
